pages.text: Inform them akv divid them; (kamel) allowed trink her designated tag
Ili persuaded their amik kill (kamel) li obliged
Consequently kiel terrible est My retribution! Ili avert
Ni send them 1 blov whereupon ili igx like rikolt fojn
Ni far Quran facil lern! any da vi wish lern
Popol Lot rejected warnings
Ni dusx them rok. Nur Lot's famili sav je dawn
Ni ben him his famili; ni tiel rekompenc appreciative
Li avert them our requital ili ridiculed warnings
Ili negotiated him his gast; ni blind them. Sufer My retribution; vi avert
Fru des next maten devastating retribution strik them
Sufer My retribution; vi avert
Ni far Quran facil lern! any da vi wish lern
Pharaoh's popol avert
Ili rejected all our sign. Consequently ni requited them Almighty Omnipotent should
est your disbelievers put than those disbelievers? Vi absolved scripture
Perhaps ili pens Ni est winners
All da them defeated ili turn around flee
Hor awaiting them Hor est far mav painful
Certainly kulp est astray end en Infer
Ili tren hellfire forcibly. Sufer agondi retribution
Cxio ni kre precisely mezur
